Class Crypto

Helper class for signing and signature verification

Namespace: OndraKoupil\Csob
See: https://github.com/csob/paymentgateway/blob/master/eshop-integration/eAPI/v1/php/example/crypto.php
Located at Crypto.php
Methods summary
public static string
# signString( string $string, string $privateKeyFile, string $privateKeyPassword = "" )

Signs a string

Signs a string

Parameters

$string
$privateKeyFile
Path to file with your private key (the .key file from https://iplatebnibrana.csob.cz/keygen/ )
$privateKeyPassword
Password to the key, if it was generated with one. Leave empty if you created the key at https://iplatebnibrana.csob.cz/keygen/

Returns

string
Signature encoded with Base64

Throws

OndraKoupil\Csob\CryptoException
When signing fails or key file path is not valid
public static boolean
# verifySignature( string $textToVerify, string $signatureInBase64, string $publicKeyFile )

Verifies signature of a string

Verifies signature of a string

Parameters

$textToVerify
The text that was signed
$signatureInBase64
The signature encoded with Base64
$publicKeyFile

Path to file where bank's public key is saved (you can obtain it from bank's app https://iposman.iplatebnibrana.csob.cz/posmerchant or from their package on GitHub)

Returns

boolean
True if signature is correct

Throws

OndraKoupil\Csob\CryptoException
When some cryptographic operation fails and key file path is not valid
